attributes.action: stop pumping public money into benefits for the unemployed and channel it into vital services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop wasting public money eg giving it to the unemployed for years and limit the length of time that unemployed can claim to 1 year maximum. Instead channel the money into vital services to maintain and improve its economy and infrastructure.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
